column4: Need help: Anyone knows where I could find HowTo for the official nVidia drivers? My problem is that the installere asks me for missing kernel modules
You can install the nvidia drivers with ubuntu packages
Is there a reason you are installing from source
install the nvidia-glx and linux-restricted-modules-386 (assuming your 386, maybe 686,k7 if you installed a non stdnard kernel0
: ubuntu packages doesn't work fine, maybe because I have the Geforce Fx go5600 (Laptop chip)
ok, well the installer probably needs build-essential and linux-headers-2.6.10-386 installed
also make sure to unintsall
nvidia-glx
: I completely removed nvidia-glx
good
lathiat : I'll try reinstalling after having linux-headers-2.6.10-386
yes you will definatley need that package
: Is the linux-headers-2.6.10-5-386 package also required?
yes
that is pulled in by that package
because its the latest version of the haeders
please run "uname -r" and paste to me
Lathiat : # uname -r
cool
thats fine
keep going
